Description.Name: TalkForCancel
Description.Details: Initial Talk with branch to cancel

Description.Name: Branch For Cancel
Description.Details: Branch for initial cancel or continue

Actions.value: Commander, we took some heavy losses in the attack, 12 MechTechs are wounded or KIA. We must launch the assault before they strike the Argo again. We can't wait for repairs, this won't stop until they're all dead.

Description.Name: TalkChoice
Description.Details: Talk Choice to be honest, take a bribe or leave.

Description.Name: Branch
Description.Details: Branch between honest, liar and leaver.

Description.Name: TalkForHalfCredit
Description.Details: Talk for leaving half way through.

Actions.value: Tiverton granted us some MechTechs to help out while we wait for the new crew to arrive. It might not cover the whole time, but it's something.
Commander, I've asked Tiverton's leaders give you a hand with repairs. Their Techs will be on station for about three weeks, Darius should get you a new crew around then.

Once this incident cools down, I'll get you back on the Market's good side. I'm letting you "hire" some of my Techs to get them off world. They'll help for about two weeks and find their way out, no funny business. I'm sure your new Techs will arrive soon after. Until next time...
